fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Haunting Grudge**: Choose a player to haunt at night. If that player successfully uses an ability during the night, they will be dealt a powerful attack the next day, appearing as a gruesome manifestation of their guilt. This attack can bypass most forms of protection.
- **Spectral Resentment**: Once per game, when you are eliminated by any means, you will leave behind a Spectral Resentment. This resentment will randomly haunt a living player each night, blocking their abilities and causing them to feel a growing sense of unease. On the third night, the resentment will deliver a message to the player you originally targeted, revealing your role and the reason for your vengeance.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During Tuesday and Friday, **Echoing Fury**: On these days, the power of your haunting increases significantly. If a haunted player uses an ability, they will suffer an unstoppable attack the next day, reflecting the amplified anger and retribution of the Brainless faction.
- **Vengeful Spirit**: You are immune to role blocks and control effects. Any player attempting to perform such actions on you will be haunted by your spectral presence, rendering them unable to perform their actions the following night.
